location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.132 of 1851 from Commodore John Patterson Porter, Commanding Indian Naval Squadron, Honourable Company's sloop Clive, Bahrain, to Lieutenant William Balfour, Commanding the Honourable Company's brig Euphrates

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of three items of correspondence from Balfour. Porter requests that a strict blockade of the harbour at al-Qatif is maintained, pending further instructions from the Resident at Bushire.
